title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1000.4 - Policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1000.4 - Policy

State Regulations

In accordance with Correction Law section 112, the
commissioner reserves the right to expeditiously revise and/or amend CMC
procedures as deemed necessary in the best interests of public safety, and the
safe, secure, and orderly operation of all department correctional
facilities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
1000.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
